title: illai enra
sahitya:
illai enra shol onru maTTum vENDAm kaSTangaL
ettanai nammait-tuLaitteDuttAlum deivam


anupallavi

  tollai tanda tandai azhindhAn puDamiTTa
svarNamAi prahlAdan shuDar viTTezhunda gadai arindum


caraNam    vIDuman mudalAm Umai kuruDar naDuvilE bhIman
vijayanum kar-shilaiyAi samainda sabhaiyilE uyir
vADik-kadarum pAcAli tuyarara ADai
kOTi kOTiyAi koDutta gOvindan aruLirukka
